xt:extension.xt:name: UpperCase

div.p: This plugin converts every letter in the selected text to uppercase. This works only for letters.
After installing the plugin it can be accessed through the editor's contextual menu by choosing Plugins->UpperCase.
div.pre: Input: tHis is a SamPle. Result: THIS IS A SAMPLE.
